speaker: Fair Ring
lines: Mushrooms consider being a circle again and this time commit.
A hum lives here just to the left of hearing.
Thistles bow and then pretend they didn't when you notice.
A brass button lies in the grass; it does not want to be found and fails.
The air smells like rain that hasn't happened yet.
A beetle crosses the ring and becomes briefly important.
If you count to twelve, something counts to eleven with you.
At thirteen, something else forgets to stop.

choices.text: Step into the ring on one foot.
Leave a brass button and back away.
